member.name: T:Aptima.Asim.DDD.CommonComponents.SimulationEventTools.SimulationEvent
member.summary: The SimulationEvent is the object used for transmitting information between the DDD Server and any client applications. The SimulationEvent is effectively a dictionary of DataValue objects.

member.name: P:Aptima.Asim.DDD.CommonComponents.SimulationEventTools.SimulationEvent.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Get or set a DataValue based on its parameter name.
